text:
Big Data com R
¬†

An√°lise de Commodities com sparklyr e vroom

library(sparklyr)
library(dplyr)
library(vroom)

# Conectar ao Spark
sc <- spark_connect(master = "local[*]") # Voc√™ pode rodar tamb√©m no Databricks, Azure, AWS, Google Colab...

# Ler grandes volumes de dados usando vroom
file_list <- list.files("data", pattern = "*_data.csv", full.names = TRUE)
combined_data <- vroom(file_list, col_types = list(
  Date = col_date(),
  Open = col_double(),
  High = col_double(),
  Low = col_double(),
  Close = col_double(),
  Volume = col_double(),
  Adj.Close = col_double(),
  Ticker = col_character()
))

# Copiar os dados para o Spark
spark_data <- copy_to(sc, combined_data, "commodities_data", overwrite = TRUE)

# Executar an√°lise no Spark: calcular a m√©dia de fechamento ajustado por commodity
average_close <- spark_data |>
  group_by(Ticker) |>
  summarise(Average_Close = mean(Adj.Close, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  collect()

print(average_close)

# Desconectar do Spark
spark_disconnect(sc)
